name: Astro Phobos
overview: You (aka Hal) just finished your shift in the mines when a major Incident occurs. Now what are you going to do next? Are You going to save the other Kappa's? Or are you just thinking about saving your life and the treasure that you can bring with yourself? What about your friend, "Ash"/Kappa 120 A/2, is he OK? Are you going to save him or don't you care about him??? Save Kappas and try to find and save your best friend, Ash. Collect diamonds, money and kill those creatures when you have the chance but most importantly try to STAY ALIVE and find the EXIT to your space ship that will bring you far away from the Dark Transit.
